home.label: Home
home.title: Qendrim's Portfolio
home.description: Portfolio website showcasing my work as a AI enthusiest, Competitor, and Builder
home.headline: AI enthusiest, Competitor, and Builder
home.subline: Hi! I'm Qendrim, a 2nd Year Computer Science student at the University of Alberta. I'm passionate about AI, competitive programming, and building cool stuff. I've worked on projects like a sign language detection software, an AI team formation algorithm, and a personal website. I'm also a competitive programmer and have won hackathons and case competitions. I'm currently looking for internships and opportunities to learn and grow. Let's connect!
home.intro: I give my all, learn from my losses, and love winning.

about.label: About
about.title: About me
about.description: Meet Qendrim, AI enthusiest, Competitor, and Builder from Canada

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Qendrim is a citizen of Canada with 5 years of experience in programming. He is passionate about creating innovative products, winning competitions, and making a difference in tech.

Index Competitive.achievements: Leading a high-performance student team by building systems for competitive success across tech, business, and design challenges.

University Education.description: Studied computer science and engineering and gained expertise in building scalable systems.

Self-Learning.description: Continuously learning through courses, mentorship, and hands-on experience in product development and leadership.

PyTorch.description: Experienced in building and training deep learning models for classification, prediction, and generation tasks.

TensorFlow.description: Proficient in implementing scalable neural networks and deploying models in production environments.

Scikit-learn.description: Used extensively for traditional ML tasks including classification, regression, clustering, and model evaluation.

Pandas & NumPy.description: Skilled in efficient data manipulation, preprocessing pipelines, and numerical computing for ML workflows.

Algorithm Design.description: Strong foundation in building custom algorithms for optimization, team formation, and decision-making systems.

Automation & Scripting.description: Developed systems to automate workflows, simulate outcomes, and streamline data-driven processes.
